name: Punch Monk: Mind Maze
description:
Punch Monk lives upon the highest mountain over the valley in deep meditation, defending his tribe from evil spirits that lurk beyond the fold.

Made for the Narrative Based Jam #1

Controls:

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

Shift + WASD - Dash

LMB - Light Attack

RMB - Heavy Attack

Q - Uppercut

E (hold) - heal

Esc- Exit game

Credits:

Designer & Programmer - Tadg Enright

3D Artist & Animator -Jamie Cooper

Music by:
Thorn Beats, 88VLEXX

3D Assets:

https://opengameart.org/content/modular-temple-3d-models
